SELECT 'common' AS table_name,id,name FROM common_user WHERE telephone = #{tel} UNION SELECT 'admin' AS table_name,id,name FROM common_backend_user WHERE telephone = #{tel}
SELECT * FROM field_coop_member WHERE state = '0' AND id = #{ID}
SELECT id,name,img_url,assistant,user_id FROM field_coop_member WHERE (assistant ='1' OR assistant IS NULL) AND state='0' AND coop_id = #{coop_id}

SELECT A.id, A.user_id,A.name,A.img_url,count(*) AS PlantNUM FROM field_coop_member A,field_info B WHERE A.coop_id=#{coop_id} AND A.state='0' AND A.user_id = B.user_id GROUP BY A.name,A.img_url,A.user_id

SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN A.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT count(*) FROM field_info B WHERE B.user_id = A.user_id) END AS PlantNUM FROM field_coop_member A WHERE A.coop_id=#{coop_id} AND A.state='0' GROUP BY A.name,A.img_url,A.user_id
select coop_id,name,img_url,assistant,0 as total from field_coop_member where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(1) as total from field_coop_member where coop_id = #{coop_id}
SELECT coop_id,GROUP_CONCAT( b.user_id ) AS all_user_id FROM field_coop a LEFT JOIN field_coop_member b ON a.id = b.coop_id WHERE a.official_user_id = #{user_id} AND b.state = '0'
